body.name: Women's and Men's Hair Growth Conditioner - Biotin and Hemp Anti Hair Loss Treatment for Thinning Hair - Natural and Organic Thickening and Volumizing Ingredients - No Parabens or Sulphates
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 28 mins
features: HAIR REGROWTH TREATMENT: No one likes losing their hair! Take control of balding, brittle, or thinning hair with this powerful hair thickening conditioner for men and women. Works best with Dr Hempster’s anti hair loss shampoo.

5 NATURAL POWER INGREDIENTS: Hemp oil stimulates new growth; biotin cleanses & thickens, saw palmetto fights enzymes that cause baldness, wheat protein for elasticity, & argan oil rich in antioxidants to stimulate hair growth.

REVITALIZES & REPAIRS: This anti hair loss conditioner is rich in hair growth stimulating antioxidants and Omega 3,6 & 9 fatty acids, that thicken & strengthen your hair. This formula also works as a detangling conditioner.

SCALP PROTECTION: Not only does this conditioner add volume & thickness to your hair, it also helps combat the causes of dry, itchy or irritated scalp. The soothing, moisturizing ingredients help keep your hair and scalp hydrated & more comfortable.

ORGANIC & CRUELTY-FREE: This hair thinning treatment is made in the USA and contains no parabens, toxins, sulfates or harmful chemicals, it is non-GMO, is not tested on animals. It’s the perfect worry-free hair loss product!
body.description: Is thinning hair affecting your confidence? Dr Hempster’s advanced Hair Loss conditioner is a powerful restorative that can reverse the signs of hair loss.REGAIN CONTROL OF HAIR LOSS Thinning hair can transform the way we look and how we see ourselves. Give a boost to your vitality today with our anti hair loss conditioner.Cruelty-free and suitable for vegans Includes many organic botanical ingredientsMade in America Thickens hair so you look younger for longerNo toxins, harsh chemicals, parabens & sulfatesKeeps the confident ‘you’ that you know and love A blend of 5 main natural active ingredients that strengthen, condition, enrich & revitalize hair Works best in conjunction with Dr. Hempster Anti Hair Loss shampoo WHEN DO I SEE RESULTS?You may begin to see a change quickly, however it can take at least 3 months of daily use to see noticeably thicker hair. Until then, our hair regrowth shampoo will gently nourish your hair & scalp and improve its overall condition. WHAT IF IT MAKES MY HAIR FALL OUT?It is normal at the beginning to experience some additional hair loss as the cleansing extracts in Dr Hempster’s Biotin shampoo and conditioner work to get rid of older, weaker hairs, and then nourish and renew healthier stronger hair.For best results use regularly with our Dr. Hempster shampoo.Relax! you're covered by our 100% Money Back Guarantee, no questions asked.Click Add to Cart now to have abundant looking hair you’ll adore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shampoo and the scent. Recommend the conditioner as well.
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo and the conditioner. It’s been great for my hair. (Blonde, Fine, Medium thickness, long)I was on narcotics for years for a chronic pain condition from which I’m still struggling. The narcs played havoc with my once thick hair and I wanted to see if I could repair some of the damage. My beautician says this is working. I’ve got hair growing most noticeable on the front of my hairline causing stray insubordinate pieces to poke out when back in a pony tail. Lol. I’m also scent sensitive and this doesn’t bother me. It smells so good. It leaves my hair soft and manageable. Both the shampoo and conditioner wash out clean leaving no nasty residue on the hair. I just bought my second set. I’m very happy with this product and have told friends about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nothing to not like about this product!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is a good product.
reviews.reviewText: The design of the bottle can be change to make easier to hold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I vacuumed there was a lot of my hair in the vacuum, not the dogs hair but my hair. And now there’s no more hair in the vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for hairloss but good for frizz
reviews.reviewText: Been usong the conditioner and the shampoo for a while. Doesn’t help with hair loss at all, but it does help control frizz, so I’ll keep using them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I originally got the anti hair loss shampoo made by the same company, I used it, and after 3 to 4 weeks, I started noticing fuller hair. That's been working great. I decided to try out their anti hair loss conditioner. It smells great, and my hair is a lot softer, but after 3 to 4 weeks, I started to noticing these small hairs in the floor of the bathroom. I asked my wife about it, and she said that she's been noticing small curly hairs in my son's room as well. I confronted him about it, and he said, "well, you know that conditioner you got?" Overall, great product, but keep it away from teenagers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more dry hair. No hair in hairbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t like it
reviews.reviewText: I lost a lot of much hair after I used this product, I thought it would help but it made it worst. I am si sad about all the bunch of hair fell down during the weeks I used this. I had to stop using it, please be careful.
